column2: Our recent conquest of Thrace as attracted the attention of turkoman bands. Who seeking fame and fortune wish to join our ranks.

It is our duty to unite all the turks and subdue all the romans as the true successors of the sultanate of Rum.
It is our duty to unite all Muslims to protect Islam from opression
Constantinople is under our control and the empire of the Romans is no more. From the confort of the city of the worls desire we may now proclaim the Ottoman Empire.
Our quick rise to power as made the Sultan plenty of enemies, it is about time that we organize a mighty modern force capable of protecting the empire.
As the magnificent Sultan of the Ottoman Empire it is only suitable that we claim Istanbul for our selves and make it the seat of our potentate.

The city of the world's desire has fallen to Ottoman ambition. Deserted by the West the last of the romans valiently held off the Turks for as long as their mortal efforts allowed only to succumb to a vastly superior force.
God punishes us for our sins
If only the West would have done something
I don't see how this matters to me

The Silahdar Agha was a palace office of the Ottoman Empire, denoting the principal page of the Ottoman Sultan. As such its holders were persons of great influence, and provided many senior officials and even Grand Viziers.
The post of the Kizlar Agha or was created in 1574 and came to be occupied by black eunuch slaves, hence it is also referred to as the Chief Black Eunuch.

The Kapi Agha, formally called the Agha of the Gate of Felicity, was the head of the eunuch servants of the palace until the late 16th century. At the time the Ottoman palace was dominated by the white eunuchs, chiefly drawn from the Christian populations of the Balkans or the Caucasus.

It was common and expected in the Ottoman Empire for the newly crowned Sultans to swiftly execute all possible competition, including their brothers and their offspring as well as any pregnant women in the harem of their predecessor.
